sentence.Network_en: Sapir's pupil, Benjamin Lee Whorf, continued the study of American Indian languages.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨皮尔的学生本杰明·李·沃夫继续研究美洲印第安人的语言.

sentence.Network_en: This independence of language and thought is known as Sapir - Whorf Hypothesis.
sentence.Network_cn: 语言和思想的这种相互依赖性现在被称为萨丕尔-沃尔夫假说.

sentence.Network_en: Edward Sapir and Benjamin Whorf once produced a hypothesis on the relation between language and culture.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为,人类生活中没有哪一方面不与文化相联系并为之所改变.

list.abs: 第一节语言人类学的研究与萨丕尔一沃尔夫（sapir-whorf）的假说第二节萨丕尔—沃尔夫假说与纪录片拍摄实践第三章让·鲁什与法国 …
